name: ARNNewsCentreFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The ARN News Centre produces top quality reports and news bulletins which play out every hour across the Arabian Radio Network's radio stations.
Our strength lies in a multi-cultural news team of highly experienced journalists who, in a small way, reflect the wider community in the UAE. 
Local news is our main forte with in-depth coverage of latest developments across the UAE, thanks to strong links with the country's ministries, government departments and key decision makers. 
Tune in to listen or log on to read reports that are accurate, comprehensive and objective.

CONTACT DETAILS
PHONE ---- 04 435 4737
EMAIL ----- englishnews@arn.ae
TWITTER ----- ARN News Centre (@ARNNewsCentre) 
FACEBOOK--- https://www.facebook.com/ARNNewsCentre/
ADDRESS --- BS 16 Dubai Studio City Dubai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
